name: SeaSkulls
description:
Battle your comrades for gold and glory in this frenetic multiplayer game. 

This is a multiplayer game for 2-4 player. Fight with your friends (or enemies) over who is the best pirate, the first to kill 8 times other players wins! Gather bullets breaking boxes and use your special moves in the right moment. If don't have gamepads, you can use the keyboard for 2 players!

How to play?

This game is currently under development, we'll update the game from time to time with more content and features. Stay tunned ✨
